Conditional requirements are required or optional for the following step types:^[[Workflow step types](/guide/workflows/workflow-step-types.qmd)]

### {{< fa cube >}} Model Stage Change [optional]{.smallercaps .pink}

1. Under **[when these conditions are met]{.smallcaps}**, set your `AND` and `OR` conditions.
2. Add a single independent rule or a linked condition group. These rules and groups can be nested if desired:

    - Click **{{< fa plus >}} Add Rule** to add an independent rule.
    - Click **{{< fa plus-minus >}} Add Group** to add a linked group of rules that all must be true to qualify.

### {{< fa arrow-pointer >}} User Action v2 [optional]{.smallercaps .pink}

::: {.panel-tabset}

#### User display rules

1. Under **[display action button when]{.smallcaps}**, set your `AND` and `OR` conditions.

2. Add a single independent rule or a linked condition group. These rules and groups can be nested if desired:

    - Click **{{< fa plus >}} Add Rule** to add an independent rule.
    - Click **{{< fa plus-minus >}} Add Group** to add a linked group of rules that all must be true to qualify.

#### Require model inventory fields

- Select any **[requested fields]{.smallcaps}**^[[Manage model inventory fields](/guide/model-inventory/manage-model-inventory-fields.qmd)] to be entered by users during the action.

- **Toggle Optional** to on if the field should be optional and not required.

#### Enable user action deadline

1. Toggle **Enable deadline** on to configure a **[user action deadline]{.smallcaps}** for when users should complete this action by.

2. Then, under **[end action:]{.smallcaps}** select the type of deadline:
    - **After Time Interval** — Set the **[amount]{.smallcaps}** and **[unit]{.smallcaps}** of the deadline.
    - **At Specified Date** — Set the date and time the action should [wait until]{.smallcaps}.
    - **At Specified Date on Model Field** — Select a date, date time, or calculated **[model field]{.smallcaps}** that defines the deadline.
    - **Time Delta from Specified Date on Model Field** — Select a date, date time, or calculated **[model field]{.smallcaps}** to calculate a deadline from, then set a **[time delta direction]{.smallcaps}** and **[wait duration]{.smallcaps}**.

:::



### {{< fa users >}} Approval [required]{.smallercaps .pink}

1. Click **{{< fa plus >}} Add Rule** under [approval group]{.smallcaps} to set your `AND` conditions.^[One approver per rule must provide approval.]

    Select from either **User Roles**,^[[Manage roles](/guide/configuration/manage-roles.qmd)] **Model Stakeholder Types**,^[[Manage model stakeholder types](/guide/configuration/manage-model-stakeholder-types.qmd)] or **User Type** inventory field^[[Manage model inventory fields](/guide/model-inventory/manage-model-inventory-fields.qmd#inventory-field-types)
    ] for your **[approval group]{.smallcaps}**.

2. Select the **[fields to review]{.smallcaps}** shown to your [approval group]{.smallcaps}s as read-only fields.

<!-- - Under **[threshold]{.smallcaps}**, set the minimum percentage of approvers required for the resource to be approved. -->

### {{< fa bullhorn >}} Broadcast [required]{.smallercaps .pink}

Select from either **Model Stakeholder Types**^[[Manage model stakeholder types](/guide/configuration/manage-model-stakeholder-types.qmd)] or **User Roles**.^[[Manage roles](/guide/configuration/manage-roles.qmd)]

### {{< fa maximize >}} Condition Branch [required]{.smallercaps .pink}

1. Under each branch's **[conditions]{.smallcaps}**, set your `AND` and `OR` conditions.
2. Add a single independent rule or a linked condition group. These rules and groups can be nested if desired:

    - Click **{{< fa plus >}} Add Rule** to add an independent rule.
    - Click **{{< fa plus-minus >}} Add Group** to add a linked group of rules that all must be true to qualify.

### {{< fa clock >}} Wait [required]{.smallercaps .pink}

Select when you would like to [resume workflow:]{.smallcaps}

::: {.panel-tabset}

#### **After Time Interval**

Set the **[wait duration]{.smallcaps}** in minutes, hours, or days.

#### At Specified Date

Set a time to **[wait until]{.smallcaps}** as defined by a specific timestamp.

#### At Specified Date on Model Field

Set the **[model field]{.smallcaps}**^[[Manage model inventory fields](/guide/model-inventory/manage-model-inventory-fields.qmd#inventory-field-types)] with a valid `Date` or `Date Time` type model inventory field that defines the specific timestamp on a per model basis.

##### Time Delta from Specified Date on Model Field

a. Set the **[model field]{.smallcaps}**^[[Manage model inventory fields](/guide/model-inventory/manage-model-inventory-fields.qmd#inventory-field-types)] with a valid `Date` or `Date Time` type model inventory field that defines the specific timestamp on a per model basis.

b. Select a **[time delta direction]{.smallcaps}** relative to your selected field.

c. Enter in a **[wait duration]{.smallcaps}** in minutes, hours, days, or months for the delta.

:::


### {{< fa cloud-arrow-up >}} HTTP Request [optional]{.smallercaps .pink}

::: {.panel-tabset}

#### Request timeout

- Enter in a request timeout in seconds under **[timeout (seconds)]{.smallcaps}**.

- Max 300 seconds, or enter `0` to disable timeout.

#### Request options

Toggle the following request options on or off:

- **[fail on non-]{.smallcaps}[2]{.smallercaps}[xx]{.smallcaps}** — Whether or not the request will be considered failed if the response status code is not in the `2xx` range.

- **[allow invalid certificates]{.smallcaps}** — Whether or not the request will be allowed to use invalid certificates.

- **[follow redirects]{.smallcaps}** — Whether or not the request will follow redirects.

- **[require https]{.smallcaps}** — Whether or not the request will require HTTPS.

#### Request headers

Enter in optional headers to include with your request:

1. Click **{{< fa plus >}} Add Header** under [headers]{.smallcaps} to enter a header.

2. Provide a **Header Name** and **Header Value**.

:::
